attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To have TV Broadcaster and "Funny-Man", Johnathon Ross Sacked due to his and Russel Brand's obscene phone calls to Andrew Sachs. If anyone else had made these types of calls to a 78yr old man, they would have been halled through the courts.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
